welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Narborough, a charming town known for its picturesque countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience the beauty and warmth of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport primarily serves low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport is used for domestic and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nottingham Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
